texto: 6.2.2.1 Purpose The purpose of the Infrastructure Management process is to provide the infrastructure and services to projects to support organization and project objectives throughout the life cycle. This process defines, provides and maintains the facilities, tools, and communications and information technology assets needed for the organization’s business with respect to the scope of this document. 30 © ISO/IEC 2017 – All rights reserved © IEEE 2017 – All rights reserved Authorized licensed use limited to: Burapha University provided by UniNet.
